title.value: ValueSet – Hypertensive Disorders of Pregnancy SNOMED CT

description.value: This value set includes terms related to hypertensive disorders of pregnancy which include pre-existing hypertension, chronic hypertension, hypertensive chronic kidney disease, essential hypertension, hypertension diagnosed during the course of pregnancy and diagnoses of pre-eclampsia and eclampsia.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
